title: Ezreal cinematic
body: Why arent there any ezreal cinematics... His lore is so interesting

replies.body: From your lips to Papa Rito's ears. I have a hard drive full of Ezreal pitches.

How many First Borns do I have to offer you to have a peek into that glorious hard drive? I am also willing to give my eye and true name if it has some good old fluffy {{champion:81}} {{champion:99}}  â€”- Oh, sorry, Jarro and Lux.

boards would lose their shit. any subreddit dedicated to something less popular would lose their shit. Cinematics themselves take alot of time and are quite expensive to make.

All in all it would make more sense for riot to create cinematics to promote new releases/skinlines. Lore cinematics are very rare and will probably stay that way for a while sadly. The only one's we've gotten are ryze's, jinx' music video and i think the amumu one is lore based. That said they could pick up the whole "rough animation" thing they tried again like with darius and mf. 

No character in this game would function better to explore runeterra than runeterra's prodigal explorer obviously.
